newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela oil basket rises $0.47 to $15.75 in week.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela oil basket rises $0.47 to $15.75 in week.

text.p: The average export price for Venezuela's basket of crude and refined products rose $0.47 to $15.75 on Friday, compared to $15.28 on June 27, the Energy and Mines Ministry said.
The average price for the year so far is $16.80 per barrel, the ministry statement said.
Venezuela's oil export price averaged $16.92 per barrel last year compared to $14.84 per barrel in 1995.
The Venezuelan government based its 1997 budget calculations on an average price of $14.40 per barrel and its 1998 budget proposal is based on a $15.50 per barrel target price.
